snippet.title: Arc Raiders Trials Guide - How To DOMINATE This Week's Trials (Week of 12/01)
snippet.description:
Raiders! Week 6 of competitive Trials is here, and we’re breaking down every challenge so you can secure easy 3-star rankings and climb the leaderboards. From efficient Hornet farming to mastering the hidden bunker and maximizing your elite enemy kills, this guide gives you everything you need to push points solo or with a squad. Stay sharp, extract safely, and dominate this week’s Trials.

0:00 Intro
2:10 Trial 1 - Damage Hornets
4:04 Trial 2 - Deliver Carryables
5:33 Trial 3 - Damage Rocketeers, Leapers or Bastions
7:49 Trial 4 - Destroy Pops
9:05 Trial 5 - Open ARC Probes
10:13 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders

*Our NEW 'Topside' Merch Is Now Available*

iPhone Case - https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPHvE6gLS6TcQ-qjfhs/
Poster - https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPHvE6s2A9S3R-W7g61/
